product_name: EK Ekcessories Cat Crap Spray-On Anti-Fog Lens Cleaner - 1 oz.
long_description: Now in a spray, Cat Crap anti-fog treatment for sunglasses, ski glasses and goggles is easier than ever to use. Easy to carry in your pocket or pack, the one-ounce spray container holds enough Cat Crap for multiple uses. Simply spray on cleaner and wipe off with a soft cloth; safe for use with all lenses and lens coatings.
short_description: Now in a spray, Cat Crap anti-fog treatment for sunglasses, ski glasses and goggles is easier than ever to use.
